text: Club Social y Deportivo Comunicaciones is a Guatemalan football club from Guatemala City. They are the second-most successful club in Guatemala, behind arch-rival Municipal. ==Honours== *Liga Nacional de Guatemala: 28 ::1956, 1957–58, 1959–60, 1968–69, 1970–71, 1971, 1972, 1977, 1979–80, 1981, 1982, 1985–86, 1990–91, 1994–95, 1996–97, 1997–98, 1998–99, 1999 Apertura, 2001 Clausura, 2002 Apertura, 2003 Clausura, 2008 Apertura, 2010 Apertura, 2011 Clausura, 2012 Apertura, 2013 Clausura, 2013 Apertura ::Runners-up (22): 1950–51, 1952–53, 1954–55, 1961–62, 1965–66, 1975, 1976, 1978, 1983, 1991–92, 1992–93, 1995–96, 2000 Clausura, 2000 Apertura, 2002 Clausura, 2003 Apertura, 2004 Apertura, 2005 Apertura, 2006 Apertura, 2008 Clausura, 2009 Apertura, 2011 Apertura *Copa de Guatemala: 8 ::1951–52, 1955, 1970, 1972, 1983, 1986, 1991–92, 2009 *CONCACAF Champions' Cup: 1 (jointly claimed) ::1978 (shared with Defence Force F.C. and Leones Negros U de G) ::Runners-up (2): 1962, 1969 *Torneo Fraternidad / UNCAF Club Championship: 2 ::1971, 1983 ::Runners-up (3): 1976, 1977, 2003 *CONCACAF Cup Winners Cup: 0 ::Runners-up (1): 1991 Category:Guatemala City Category:1949 establishments in North America Category:Establishments in Guatemala Category:North American football clubs
title: Comunicaciones F.C.
